name: Marin Museum of Bicycling & Mountain Bike Hall of Fame
description: Premier bicycle history museum at the birthplace of mountain biking, featuring 19th century bikes and the Mountain Bike Hall of Fame.
fullDescription: Premier bicycle history museum at the birthplace of mountain biking, featuring 19th century bikes and the Mountain Bike Hall of Fame.
address: 1966 Sir Francis Drake Blvd, Fairfax, CA 94930
